description:
Make your own story. User-friendly software for LLM roleplaying

RisuAI, or Risu for short, is a cross platform AI chatting software / web application with powerful features such as multiple API support, assets in the chat, regex functions and much more.
- Added TriggerV2 hotkeys
- Added TriggerV2 context menu
- Added missing triggers from V1 in TriggerV2
- Added advanced if trigger
- Added show deprecated v1 trigger option
- Added show translation loading option #761
- Improved TriggerV2 GUI
- Fixed asset loading #760
